solution_line_template: Jeff was able to run a total of {run_duration_per_day_minutes} x {num_days_mon_wed} = <<{run_duration_per_day_minutes}*{num_days_mon_wed}={run_mon_wed}>>{run_mon_wed} minutes from Monday to Wednesday.
On Thursday, Jeff ran for {run_duration_per_day_minutes} - {cut_short_thursday} = <<{run_duration_per_day_minutes}-{cut_short_thursday}={run_thursday}>>{run_thursday} minutes only.
On Friday, he ran for {run_duration_per_day_minutes} + {jogged_more_friday} = <<{run_duration_per_day_minutes}+{jogged_more_friday}={run_friday}>>{run_friday} minutes.
Therefore, Jeff ran a total of {run_mon_wed} + {run_thursday} + {run_friday} = <<{run_mon_wed}+{run_thursday}+{run_friday}={total_run_time}>>{total_run_time} minutes.
